summary: This mod basically alters the lighting and atmosphere in the Dawnstar Sanctuary to increase immersion.
descriptionHtml:
I altered the lighting and atmosphere inside the dawnstar sanctuary in order to give it this creepy dark feel to it. I always thought the dark brotherhood were an evil faction and was disappointed by how well lit the sanctuary was. I\'ve also added a few quills and paper rolls here and there to make it appear as thought the tables are actually used.

I would recommend this mod with Hail Dark Brotherhood - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25871/?tab=2&navtag=%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D25871&pUp=1 to further increase the immersion.

Cheers! :D Please do let me know if you like it and perhaps I can re-light some other interiors.
author: DEEMAN021
